text: {| |} RFA Echodale (A170) was a Dale-class fleet tanker of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary. She was decommissioned on 12 April 1959 and was laid up at Devonport Dockyard. ==References== Category:Dale-class oilers Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary Category:1940 ships
title: RFA Echodale (A170)
